## Add functionality

### RSS feeds

Include an RSS feed to syndicate your content to feed readers and other websites.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html#rss-feed">Quarto blog RSS feed documentation</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

### Subscriptions

Add a third party email service to manage and send emails to your blog subscribers.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://quarto.org/docs/websites/website-blog.html#subscriptions">Quarto blog subscription documentation</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

### Extensions

Modify or extend the behavior of Quarto.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://quarto.org/docs/blog/posts/2022-07-25-feature-extensions/">Quarto extensions documentation</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

#### Quarto social embeds

From Mark Sellors, embed content from across the web into a quarto-rendered html document using a shortcode.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://quarto-social-embeds.sellorm.com/">Social embeds documentation</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

### Change your landing page

From Eric Ekholm, change your landing page to your About page.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://www.ericekholm.com/posts/demo-quarto-site/">Modifying the Default Quarto Blog Structure</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

### Netlify redirects

From Danielle Navarro, add redirects to change your blog post slugs.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://blog.djnavarro.net/posts/2022-04-20_porting-to-quarto/#netlify-redirects">Netlify redirects</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>

## GitHub Actions

Automatically publish content from code checked in to a version control system.

<h3 align="right"><a href="https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/ci.html">Publishing with Continuous Integration (CI)</a> {{< fa arrow-right-long >}}</h3>
